meta.name: Workbench Design Tokens
meta.description: Token reference mapping design-system.json conceptual roles to CSS variables and Tailwind utilities. This file documents the implementation; actual values are defined in src/index.css.

color.description: Color tokens mapped from design-system.json foundations.color.roles

background.purpose: The base layer of the interface—what lies behind everything else.

foreground.purpose: Primary text and icon color—the default for readable content.

surface.purpose: Elevated containers that sit above the background—cards, panels, modals, popovers.
surface.note: Renamed from shadcn's 'card' to align with design-system.json terminology.

surface-foreground.purpose: Text color for content on surface backgrounds.

popover.purpose: Overlay surfaces like dropdown menus and popovers.

muted.purpose: Subdued backgrounds for secondary or grouped content areas.

muted-foreground.purpose: Secondary text and icons that should recede in hierarchy.

primary.purpose: The single accent color used for interactive affordance and emphasis.

primary-foreground.purpose: Text color for content on primary-colored backgrounds.

primary-muted.purpose: A tinted, lower-saturation version of the accent for subtle emphasis—selected states, hover backgrounds.

primary-muted-foreground.purpose: Text color for content on primary-muted backgrounds.

secondary.purpose: Neutral quiet color for secondary interactive elements.
secondary.note: Kept from shadcn defaults; functionally similar to muted.

accent.purpose: Neutral quiet color for accented elements (hover states, highlights).
accent.note: Kept from shadcn defaults; functionally similar to muted.

success.purpose: Indicates successful completion, positive status, or healthy state.

success-foreground.purpose: Text color for content on success-colored backgrounds.

warning.purpose: Indicates caution, potential issues, or states requiring attention.

warning-foreground.purpose: Text color for content on warning-colored backgrounds.

destructive.purpose: Indicates danger, errors, or irreversible actions requiring caution.

destructive-foreground.purpose: Text color for content on destructive-colored backgrounds.

border.purpose: Subtle lines that define edges and separate regions.

ring.purpose: Focus ring color for keyboard navigation.

radius.description: Border radius tokens mapped from design-system.json foundations.radius.roles

none.purpose: Sharp edges for full-bleed containers, tables, aligned elements.

control.purpose: Buttons, inputs, selects, small interactive elements.

surface.purpose: Cards, modals, dropdown menus, popovers, panels.

full.purpose: Badges, tags, avatar images, toggle handles, pills.

legacy.description: Legacy radius scale maintained for backwards compatibility with shadcn defaults

typography.description: Typography tokens mapped from design-system.json foundations.typography.roles

headline.purpose: Page titles, modal titles, major section headers.

title.purpose: Card headers, panel titles, significant subsection labels.

subtitle.purpose: Supporting text beneath headlines or titles, section descriptions.

body.purpose: Primary readable content—paragraphs, table cells, form labels, list items.

body-small.purpose: Secondary content, metadata, timestamps, help text, captions.

label.purpose: Form input labels, badge text, tab labels, button text.

code.purpose: Inline code, code blocks, data that benefits from fixed-width alignment.

implementation.activation: Add class='dark' to <html> element for dark mode (default in index.html)

migration.description: Notes for migrating from shadcn defaults to this token system

card → surface.reason: Aligns with design-system.json terminology where 'surface' represents elevated containers.

additions.primary-muted: New token for selected states, hover backgrounds per 'one-accent-many-shades' principle.
additions.success: Semantic color for positive status (missing from shadcn defaults).
additions.warning: Semantic color for caution states (missing from shadcn defaults).
additions.destructive-foreground: Foreground variant for destructive backgrounds (missing from shadcn defaults).
additions.radius-none/control/surface/full: Semantic radius scale per design-system.json foundations.radius.roles.

shadcnCompatibility.note: Future 'npx shadcn add' commands will generate components with 'card' naming. Update these to 'surface' after installation, or create a post-install script.
shadcnCompatibility.legacyRadiusScale: radius-sm/md/lg/xl are preserved for backwards compatibility.
